====Idioms====
{{der-top|Idioms of {{lang|ja|世界}}}}
* {{ja-r|世界中が白壁造り|せかいじゅう が しらかべづくり}}: "all the world is plastered walls" → [[there are plenty more fish in the sea]] (in a positive sense, in reference to finding employment)
* {{ja-r|世界に余った女は無い|せかい に あまった おんな は ない}}: "there are no leftover women in the world" → there is someone for everyone (said particularly to women)
* {{ja-r|世界に鬼は無い|せかい に おに は ない}}: "there are no devils in the world" → the world is not full of heartless people, and there are many kind souls who will lend a hand (compare "the kindness of strangers")
* {{ja-r|世界は大戯場の如し|せかい は だいぎじょう の ごとし}}: "the world is just like a big theatre" → [[all the world's a stage]]
* {{ja-r|世界は張り物|せかい は はりもの}}: "the world is starched clothes" → it's all about appearances, [[clothes make the man]]
* {{ja-r|世界は回り持ち|せかい は まわりもち}}: "the world comes in turns" → [[all things come to those who wait]], [[to everything there is a season]]
* {{ja-r|世界半分自惚れしっかり|せかい はんぶん うぬぼれ しっかり}}: "of the world, only halfway, but full of conceit" → being [[full of oneself]] without bothering to learn much about the world
* {{ja-r|世界我が物|せかい わがもの}}: "the world is one's possession" → acting as if one owns the world
{{der-bottom}}
